01:21:52","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 01:21:52","title":"We put Alo Yoga's popular Airlift leggings to the test — after months of wearing and washing, we still think they're some of the best pairs out there","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/alo-yoga-airlift-leggings-review","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, we may earn money from our affiliate partners. <a href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><p><a href=\"http://www.pjatr.com/t/TUJGRk5HSUJGSEhLR01CRkxFTkpN?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.aloyoga.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f072e7d5af6cc063f2965a5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Alo Yoga\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Alo Yoga</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><a href=\"http://www.pjatr.com/t/TUJGRk5HSUJGSEhLR01CRkxFTkpN?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.aloyoga.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Alo Yoga</a> exercise gear has gained respect among yogis and celebrities since its 2007 founding.</li><li>The company makes flattering, trend-focused performance gear that can be worn from \"studio to street.\"</li><li>To see how it stacks up in person, three reporters tested the popular Airlift leggings. The bottom line? We all loved them from the start, and we still swear by them after months of wear. Find our personal reviews below.</li><li>Still looking? Read about <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-workout-clothes-women\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the best feminine workout clothes you can buy</a>.</li></ul><p>If you've ever tapped on an Instagram post of a supermodel working out, aimlessly wondering where those cute leggings are from, I'd be willing to bet that, more often than not, said model will be sporting Alo Yoga, a relatively young LA brand with an outsized following.</p><p>Since its founding in 2007, the company has become a mainstay in both diehard yogi camps and the earth's small but hyper-visible population of models and artists. Kendall Jenner, Gigi Hadid, Taylor Swift, Chrissy Teigen, Jenna Dewan, Olivia Culpo, Hailey Beiber ... the list of high-profile patrons goes on.</p><p>So, what gives?</p><p>To see for ourselves, we tested a few pairs of <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.carbon38.com/product/7-8-hw-airlift-legging-black\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Alo Yoga Airlift leggings</a> in our own (very normal) lives. The verdict: flattering, silky, and buttery soft. Despite the fact that they're trend- and fashion-focused, that shouldn't translate to impracticality; these leggings manage to look good <em>and&#160;</em>perform during exercise.&#160;</p><p>A few things to note if you're looking to buy: some reviews note sweat showing through lighter colors; the capris run slightly longer than average, and the site sells out quickly. So, if you find something you love, it may be better not to wait. The company also has a 30-day return policy for unworn gear in case the fit isn't perfect in person.&#160;</p><h2>Here's what we thought after testing the Airlift leggings:</h2>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\t7/8 High-Waist Airlift Legging\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5cddba07021b4c0937402e74?format=jpeg\" alt=\"1 alo yoga 7 8 hw airlift legging bottoms black\" height=\"974\" width=\"1298\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Carbon38</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>7/8 High-Waist Airlift Legging, $114, <a href=\"http://www.pjatr.com/t/TUJGRk5HSUJGSEhLR01CRkxFTkpN?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.aloyoga.com%2Fcollections%2Fbottoms%2Fproducts%2Fw5766r-7-8-high-waist-airlift-legging%3Fvariant%3D22026089431158\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">available at Alo</a> and <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.carbon38.com/product/7-8-hw-airlift-legging-black?int_source=algsearch&#38;int_version=0&#38;int_position=0\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Carbon38</a></h3><p>These leggings feel like a second skin, but one that's so stretchy you could bend into a pretzel and you wouldn't feel any pulling, digging, or resistance. Every time they come out of the wash, they're the first pair I put on for a workout or day of running errands. The material is silky and soft, the stretch is just enough to hold them in place without digging, and they're breathable without being sheer. They're definitely best for anything that involves bending or stretching a lot (they were designed for doing yoga, obviously), but I've worn them running plenty of times and they held up really well.</p><p>The 7/8 version fits like full-length leggings on me, but the capri version is my favorite since they fit like ankle leggings on my five-foot frame.&#160;</p><p><strong>UPDATE:</strong> It's been ten months since I first tried these leggings and I'm still deeply obsessed. So much so that I've thrown out most of my other leggings and bought another pair of these.</p><p>The sheen has sort of faded in the wash after all this time, but that's probably because I haven't followed the hand-washing directions, nor do I ever remember to turn the leggings inside out before machine-washing. Kind of my own fault. Regardless, I still love them deeply and wear them all the time! &#8212;<strong>Sally Kaplan, senior editor</strong></p>\n\tHigh-Waist Airlift Legging\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5cddb639021b4c07d720d874?format=jpeg\" alt=\"4 alo high waist airlift legging bottoms cloud\" height=\"1412\" width=\"1882\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Carbon38</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>High-Waist Airlift Legging, $118, available at <a href=\"http://www.pntra.com/t/TUJGRk5HSUJGSEhLR01CRkxFTkpN?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.aloyoga.com%2Fproducts%2Fw5561r-high-waist-airlift-legging%3Fvariant%3D21059475439734\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Alo</a>, <a href=\"http://go.redirectingat.com/?id=35871X943606&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.backcountry.com%2Falo-yoga-high-waist-tech-lift-airbrush-solid-legging-womens%3FCMP_SKU%3DAYG00AH%26MER%3D0406%26skid%3DAYG00AH-ROS-M%26mr%3AtrackingCode%3D55A80FE5-C8E6-E811-8109-005056944E17%26mr%3AreferralID%3DNA%26mr%3Adevice%3Dc%26mr%3AadType%3Dplaonline%26CMP_ID%3DPLA_GOc001%26utm_source%3DGoogle%26utm_medium%3DPLA%26k_clickid%3D_k_EAIaIQobChMImLeFtcCe4gIVlorICh3d7QBYEAYYBSABEgKBLPD_BwE_k_%26gclid%3DEAIaIQobChMImLeFtcCe4gIVlorICh3d7QBYEAYYBSABEgKBLPD_BwE\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Backcountry</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.carbon38.com/product/high-waist-airlift-legging-black\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Carbon38</a></h3><p>Looking at these leggings, you'd think they're just like any other pair, but the difference is clear once you feel them. They're buttery smooth and feel great on your legs, and they stretch very well. You can and should take advantage of the variety of color options because they're a nice change from traditional black. Although I'm of average height (5-foot-6), my legs are on the shorter side, so I found with this legging length that some fabric did bunch up &#8212; I had to choose between my ankle or knee areas. If I could go back, I'd maybe do the <a href=\"http://www.pntrs.com/t/TUJGRk5HSUJGSEhLR01CRkxFTkpN?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.aloyoga.com%2Fcollections%2Fbottoms%2Fproducts%2Fw5630r-high-waist-airlift-capri%3Fvariant%3D5841462165531\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Capri style</a> instead. But the overall feel and performance of the leggings is awesome. I personally wear them for running and weight training. <strong>&#8212;Connie Chen, senior reporter</strong></p>\n\tHigh-Waist Airlift Capri\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5cddb862021b4c08584cf332?format=jpeg\" alt=\"open uri20190227 23074 110yvv5\" height=\"999\" width=\"1332\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Goop</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>High-Waist Airlift Capri, $104, available at <a href=\"http://www.pjatr.com/t/TUJGRk5HSUJGSEhLR01CRkxFTkpN?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.aloyoga.com%2Fcollections%2Fbottoms%2Fproducts%2Fw5630r-high-waist-airlift-capri%3Fvariant%3D5841462034459%23Reviews\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Alo</a>&#160;and <a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=1237&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fshop.nordstrom.com%2Fs%2Falo-airlift-high-waist-capris%2F4924130%3Fcountry%3DUS%26currency%3DUSD%26mrkgcl%3D760%26mrkgadid%3D3323087861%26utm_content%3D61865533903%26utm_term%3Dpla-584304739338%26utm_channel%3Dshopping_ret_p%26sp_source%3Dgoogle%26sp_campaign%3D1647808954%26rkg_id%3D0%26adpos%3D1o3%26creative%3D316709233347%26device%3Dc%26matchtype%3D%26network%3Ds%26gclid%3DEAIaIQobChMIwPbNyuCg4gIVB43ICh1G7ARBEAQYAyABEgLtVPD_BwE\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Nordstrom</a></h3><p>I was surprised by how much I loved these leggings. Typically, when I see performance gear being billed as \"studio-to-street,\" I assume that's code for athleisure rather than gear that's actually compatible with hot, sweaty cardio sessions. But Alo's High-Waist Airlift Capri ($114) impressed me &#8212; the four-way stretch fabric fits like a flexible, breathable second-skin during exercise, and I've used them far more frequently for HIIT than I have for streetwear.</p><p>They're also, admittedly, pretty flattering. The creamy, silky material isn't stuffy and compressive, but it still manages to lengthen the silhouette into a lean, seamless shape. Or, as Alo puts it, they're \"engineered to lift, sculpt, contour and smooth.\" They're not exactly Spanx, but when I put them on for the first time my first thought was, \"Ah, I get why celebrities wear these so much now.\"&#160;</p><p>The one thing I'd note is that the capris run a little long, meaning they're still great for my 5'7 frame, but may end up being full-length for petites. And while I didn't notice sweat showing through on the dark cherry color I tested, other reviews mentioned seeing the sweat in lighter colors.&#160;</p><p>The price is steep at $118, and I've <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/girlfriend-collective-lite-breathable-leggings-review-2018-7\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">found cheaper options that are just as breathable</a>, but, if you're thinking of getting them, I'd wager you'll love them. <strong>&#8212;Mara Leighton, senior reporter</strong></p>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a (Mara Leighton)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f072e7d5af6cc063f2965a5?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn64@2020_3/2020/08/31/17-21-53-414_3ef52c4d395d733a.webp","https://i.insider.com/5cddba07021b4c0937402e74?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn71@2020_6/2020/08/31/17-22-07-667_dde44ff301fbc27f.webp","https://i.insider.com/5cddb639021b4c07d720d874?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn27@2020_3/2020/08/31/17-22-12-514_3edc518c50447e5d.webp","https://i.insider.com/5cddb862021b4c08584cf332?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn79@2020_4/2020/08/31/17-22-18-353_2005cda87df7eee1.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn51@2020_3/2020/08/31/17-22-14-421_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=T6tW2nkTOHQ:V3JZSNCwPys:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn87@2020_5/2020/08/31/17-22-06-510_4f311207fe3eefd4.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=T6tW2nkTOHQ:V3JZSNCwPys:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn16@2020_6/2020/08/31/17-21-57-027_cd53f157370bdcb0.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn76@2020_1/2020/08/31/17-22-07-798_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=T6tW2nkTOHQ:V3JZSNCwPys:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn7@2020_3/2020/08/31/17-22-18-570_94ec5542b52c5f17.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/T6tW2nkTOHQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn52@2020_6/2020/08/31/17-22-06-724_cee146ca4e16c932.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598894512825},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 01:21:52","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 01:21:52","title":"Here's what it looked like when a Ukrainian fighter jet smacked into a road sign while landing on a highway","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/ukrainian-fighter-jet-hits-road-sign-while-landing-on-highway-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4c78d060bf1f00280796b0?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Ukraine Su-27 fighter jet highway road sign\" height=\"1166\" width=\"2332\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A road sign stuck on the side of a Ukrainian Su-27 after the fighter jet struck the sign while practicing landing on a roadway, August 2020.\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQYtmnHH4vA&#38;feature=youtu.be\" target=\"_blank\">Channel 5/YouTube</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>Ukrainian Air Force Sukhoi Su-27 combat jet struck a highway sign during an exercise in Ukraine on August 27.</li><li>The fighter jet and several others were practicing dispersed landings on a highway when the collision occurred.</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer\" data-stringify-link=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\" data-sk=\"tooltip_parent\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li></ul><p>A <a href=\"https://theaviationist.com/2019/08/19/you-could-almost-touch-a-ukrainian-su-27p-flanker-during-this-epic-air-to-air-photoshoot/\">Ukrainian Air Force Sukhoi Su-27</a> combat aircraft narrowly avoided a more serious accident when it landed short and collided with a traffic sign during an expedient tactical airstrip training exercise on Thursday, August 27, 2020, in Ukraine.</p><p>The unusual accident occurred on a closed portion of the M06 international highway between Kyiv and the Hungarian Border near the city of Chop. The area was being used for a training simulation that demonstrated the use of \"twelve fighters\" on an improvised, forward dispersed highway landing area according to a report on unian.info.</p><p>The aircraft were reported to be from the Ukrainian \"39th Tactical Aviation Brigade\" according to the report. A quote attributed to a Ukrainian military source on the media outlet said, \"These skills will come in handy for war pilots in the event of a large-scale enemy invasion.\"</p><p>Reports of the incident surfaced on Twitter and from reporter Dylan Malyasov of the <a href=\"https://defence-blog.com/news/ukrainian-air-force-exercise-almost-ends-in-disaster.html\">defence-blog.com</a>. A number of people in the area took photos and video of the incident, which immediately circulated across social media.</p><p>The roadway had been prepared for the tactical exercise in advance by removing some road signs and lamp posts in the planned landing area. Police also blocked access to the roadway. Pyrotechnics were also set off to scare birds away from the area to prevent bird-strike.</p><p>The aircraft that collided with the traffic sign may have made a short approach for an unknown reason. A second Su-27 can be seen in one video immediately behind the first making a longer approach and rejected landing as two additional Su-27s fly overhead in echelon formation as if entering a landing pattern.</p><iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/dQYtmnHH4vA\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe><iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/KV3aNi_6AyI\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe><iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/2wIPo2hOQ_c\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe><p>A photo in several social media posts and news reports showed the Su-27 involved in the incident, apparently back at an airfield, with the bent traffic sign wrapped around the intake inlet on the aircraft's left side.</p><blockquote class=\"twitter-tweet blockquote\" data-lang=\"en\" data-cards=\"\" data-conversation=\"\">&#8212;Defence Blog  (@Defence_blog) <a href=\"https://twitter.com/mims/statuses/1299370429740650496?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">August 28, 2020</a></blockquote><script async src=\"//platform.twitter.com/widgets.js\" charset=\"utf-8\"></script><p>Many Russian-built aircraft, such the MiG-29, are equipped with a ventilated cover <a href=\"https://theaviationist.com/2012/07/16/yak-130/\">that lowers over their intakes at landing speeds to prevent the ingestion of foreign objects into the engine</a> when operating from unimproved areas such as a highway or field.</p><p>The Su-27 involved in this incident did not appear to be equipped with an anti-foreign object damage cover on its intakes, meaning the aircraft's engine could have sustained damage had the sign gone directly into the intake instead of being lodged on its edge.</p><p>A similar incident, occurred to one A-10C Thunderbolt II aircraft assigned to the 104th Fighter Squadron, Maryland Air National Guard, during landing and take off training from an <a href=\"https://theaviationist.com/2017/08/10/u-s-a-10-thunderbolt-ii-jets-practice-take-off-and-landing-on-highway-in-estonia/\">extension of J&#228;gala-K&#228;ravete Highway</a>, a portion of the longer road known as Piibe Highway, in Northern Estonia, on August 10, 2017. The aircraft hit and damaged a road sign at roughly 3.15 PM local time.</p><p>Although the Warthog, carrying a dummy AGM-85 Maverick missile and a Litening ATP (Advanced Targeting Pod) <a href=\"http://news.postimees.ee/4207761/us-aircraft-damaged-as-it-practices-landing-on-highway?gallery=105951&image=69803230323\">did not suffer significant damage</a> (the Thunderbolt II is an extremely sturdy plane, able to survive much more than a few scrapes) and was able to take off again later on, the highway remained closed until the following morning.</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/ukrainian-fighter-jet-hits-road-sign-while-landing-on-highway-2020-8'>Business Insider</a></div><div 01:21:52","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 01:21:52","title":"Apple just split its stock. Here's how shares have performed one year after its previous stock splits.","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/apple-stock-split-shares-performed-year-after-previous-historical-returns-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d045360bf1f00280796ff?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Apple WWDC 2019 Jony Ive Dan Riccio\" height=\"2511\" width=\"5022\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Justin Sullivan/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul><li><strong>Apple just completed its fifth stock split ever on Monday, as investors received four shares for every one share held.</strong></li><li><strong>The split quartered Apple's stock price from around $500 last week to about $125 today.</strong></li><li><strong>Here's how shares of Apple performed one year after its previous stock splits, according to Ally Invest.</strong></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingesttm_medium=ingest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</strong></li></ul><hr ><p><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/aapl-stock\">Apple</a> just <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/news/stocks/apple-stock-split-price-what-that-means-how-many-shares-2020-7-1029455711#\">completed its fifth stock split in its history</a> on Monday.</p><p>Investors of Apple received four shares for every one share held, resulting in its stock price being quartered from around $500 last week to about $125 today.</p><p>So, how have shares of Apple performed after its previous stock splits? <a href=\"https://www.ally.com/do-it-right/trends/weekly-viewpoint-august-7-2020-apple-stock-split/\">According to Ally Invest,</a>&#160;quite well.</p><p>After Apple's first 2-for-1 stock split on June 16, 1987, shares went on to return 9.6% over the next year, handily outperforming the S&#38;P 500's 9.9% decline during the same time period.</p><p>Apple's second 2-for-1 stock on June 21, 2000, was at the height of the dot-com bubble. One year after the split, shares were down 59.6%, underperforming the S&#38;P 500's 16.4% decline during the same time period.</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/us-investing-championship-strategy-matthew-caruso-contender-secret-to-return-2020-8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">US Investing Championship hopeful Matthew Caruso landed a 382% return in the first half of 2020. He shares the unique twist he's putting on a classic trading strategy &#8212; and 3 stocks he's holding right now.</a></em></p><p>After Apple's third 2-for-1 stock split on February 28, 2005, shares returned 52.7% over the following year, outperforming the S&#38;P 500's 6.4% return over the same time period.</p><p>Apple's fourth stock split on June 9, 2014, which was 7 shares for 1, was followed by a 36.0% return over the next year. Shares handily outperformed the S&#38;P 500's 6.6% return over the same time period.</p><p>While Apple has demonstrated generally strong returns following its stock splits over the years, few companies have followed its path. According to Ally Invest, few S&#38;P 500 companies are splitting their stocks today compared to the 1990s when it was all the rage.</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/investing-strategy-how-to-hedge-tech-stocks-at-risk-jpmorgan-2020-8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">JPMorgan lays out 2 reasons why 'bulletproof'-looking tech stocks are actually at serious risk &#8212; and shares 2 simple trades for investors looking to protect themselves</a></em></p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d16dd7ffa48002894d21d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"ally invest chart.JPG\" height=\"504\" width=\"703\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Ally Invest</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>Investors who owned one share of Apple prior to its first stock split in 1987 would own 224 shares today.</p><p>If Apple never split its stock over its history, shares would be trading at $27,957.44 as of Friday's close.</p><p>Shares of Apple traded up 3% to $128.47 on Monday, representing all-time highs.&#160;</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong> <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-picks-to-buy-hedge-mutual-funds-market-favorites-goldman-2020-8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">GOLDMAN SACHS: Buy these 9 stocks that are poised to continue crushing the market as the 'shared favorites' of Wall Street's biggest investors</a></em></p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a The site does this to ensure that their prices are competitive and, of course, to help boost profits.</p><p>We've gathered all the best discounts currently available on the retail giant. Below you'll find one-day sales via Amazon's Gold Box promotion, exclusive coupon codes, and, of course, dynamically-priced goods ranging from tech, fashion, gaming, and home goods.</p><p>Due to the src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=d3OJ6Zl2Flo:FmJvuuKmsd8:V_sGLiPBpWU\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=d3OJ6Zl2Flo:FmJvuuKmsd8:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a Bufete)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5ee2a7bbf0f4194b3e0caca2?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn72@2020_4/2020/08/31/17-22-26-362_c4db463315c8e6fa.webp","https://i.insider.com/5dcdc7be79d75704653f35a0?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn51@2020_4/2020/08/31/17-22-12-920_90214b17836dd909.webp","https://i.insider.com/5c3cebe5bd773054e81227c9?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn63@2020_1/2020/08/31/17-22-17-836_060d86e60f5f7915.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f1090375af6cc38b6507af2?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn11@2020_5/2020/08/31/17-21-58-447_0374085c1ffd1c98.webp","https://i.insider.com/5efb8e70aee6a823ad1dc080?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn95@2020_1/2020/08/31/17-21-59-385_9c4e466370b95569.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn51@2020_3/2020/08/31/17-22-14-421_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=d3OJ6Zl2Flo:FmJvuuKmsd8:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn47@2020_4/2020/08/31/17-22-04-304_56a4272d2a7266ee.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=d3OJ6Zl2Flo:FmJvuuKmsd8:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn64@2020_6/2020/08/31/17-22-13-337_4417eb714e05c149.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn76@2020_1/2020/08/31/17-22-07-798_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=d3OJ6Zl2Flo:FmJvuuKmsd8:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn43@2020_1/2020/08/31/17-22-15-765_98b55796e0c14b36.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/d3OJ6Zl2Flo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn59@2020_4/2020/08/31/17-21-57-590_4fdccb1505112473.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598894512917},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 01:21:52","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 01:21:52","title":"General Electric is worth less than $5 per share, JPMorgan analyst Stephen Tusa says as he withdraws target price","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/general-electric-stock-price-worth-less-than-jpmorgan-analyst-ge-2020-8","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4cf5717ffa48002894d178?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Boeing 777X Engine\" height=\"2880\" width=\"5760\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The GE Aviation GE9X engine powers the Boeing 777X.\n<p class=\"copyright\">TERRAY SYLVESTER/Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul><li><strong>General Electric is worth less than $5 per share, JPMorgan said in a note on Monday.</strong></li><li><strong>Analyst Stephen Tusa, who has been bearish on General Electric over the past three years and has proven prescient with his bearish calls, removed his price target on the industrial conglomerate.</strong></li><li><strong>Tusa is now \"more negative on GE\" heading into the second half of 2020, despite the company beating earnings estimates for the second quarter.</strong></li><li><strong>\"We see little equity value here,\" Tusa said.</strong></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestedium=ingest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</strong></li></ul><hr ><p><a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/ge-stock\">General Electric</a> is worth less than $5 per share, JPMorgan analyst Stephen Tusa said in a note published on Monday.</p><p>A drop to $4.99 would represent a 25% decline from Friday's close.</p><p>Tusa, who has been bearish on General Electric over the past three years and <a href=\"https://www.wsj.com/articles/ges-nemesis-an-eerily-prescient-bear-11559905201\">has become a well-known analyst on the name,</a> said \"we are more negative on GE\" heading into the second half of 2020, and that he sees \"little equity value here,\" according to the note.</p><p>General Electric still has no official earnings guidance, which provides little visibility on the business looking three to six months out, Tusa said.</p><p>But General Electric's call for positive free cash flow in 2021, along with a long-term free cash flow target, is keeping other Wall Street analysts \"persistently optimistic.\"</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong>&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-picks-to-buy-hedge-mutual-funds-market-favorites-goldman-2020-8?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">GOLDMAN SACHS: Buy these 9 stocks that are poised to continue crushing the market as the 'shared favorites' of Wall Street's biggest investors</a></em></p><p>Tusa thinks \"the collapse of this forward estimate [free cash flow] curve is coming soon,\" the note said.</p><p>General Electric may not \"see normal\" until 2024 due to outstanding debt maturities and options resets, Tusa highlighted.</p><p>And for General Electric's aviation unit, a COVID-19 vaccine is a \"must have for survival, not an upside drive to our well below consensus estimates,\" Tusa said.</p><p>\"Our simple math is that with a sector at 17x EBITDA, subtracting the 17x leverage burden here, equity value is below $5 and we are withdrawing our price target,\" Tusa concluded.</p><p>Shares of General Electric rose 0.5% to $6.64 in Monday trades. Shares are down 41% year-to-date.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4cff7060bf1f00280796ed?format=jpeg\" alt=\"ge stock chart.JPG\" height=\"648\" width=\"842\" (Matthew Fox)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f4cf5717ffa48002894d178?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn63@2020_2/2020/08/31/17-22-06-399_f308b043de72f6a3.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f4cff7060bf1f00280796ed?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn83@2020_5/2020/08/31/17-21-56-970_bebcfc647c5b77d7.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn51@2020_3/2020/08/31/17-22-14-421_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=IsL_skACROw:iB45o19qCnM:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn27@2020_5/2020/08/31/17-22-21-571_df9ceeda1d4687a6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=IsL_skACROw:iB45o19qCnM:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn92@2020_5/2020/08/31/17-21-59-237_b8ff3aa7da06397d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn76@2020_1/2020/08/31/17-22-07-798_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=IsL_skACROw:iB45o19qCnM:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn99@2020_3/2020/08/31/17-22-00-855_7e02b37ae504ee2d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/IsL_skACROw":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn68@2020_6/2020/08/31/17-22-10-590_6cfb403583733fc4.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598894512861},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 01:21:52","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 01:21:52","title":"Polk's new $250 soundbar isn't as advanced as more expensive models, but it still delivers a huge improvement over most built-in TV speakers","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/polk-audio-signa-s3-soundbar-review","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, we may earn money from our affiliate partners. <a href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f493a407ffa48002894ce08?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Polk Soundbar\" height=\"1058\" width=\"1411\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Tyler Hayes/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Polk Signa S3 soundbar with wireless subwoofer</a> provides improved audio performance over most built-in TV speakers.</li><li>Though the 2.1-channel soundbar can get quite loud, its physical size is small enough to fit under most displays.</li><li>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">S3</a> comes in at $250, which provides solid value for the audio performance and features you get, but the device is missing integrated digital assistant support and surround sound.</li><li>Going beyond movies and shows, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Signa S3</a> can also function as a music speaker using Chromecast audio or Bluetooth.</li></ul><div id=\"ProductCard_5f493dad58c24d023c37aecb\" style=\"position:relative; display:block; width: 100%\"><iframe src=\"https://produktor.businessinsider.com/productCardService?id=5f493dad58c24d023c37aecb&type=small&live=true\" width=\"100%\" height=\"150%\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen=\"\" style=\"position:absolute; top:0; left: 0\"></iframe></div><bi-shortcode id=\"table-of-contents-sticky\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-type=\"h2\">Table of Contents: Masthead Sticky</bi-shortcode><p>Though built-in speakers on TVs have improved somewhat over the last few years, most displays are still lacking in the audio department. This is usually a result of the thinness of modern TVs squeezing out the physical room that quality speakers need.</p><p>As a solution, companies like Polk offer a variety of soundbars, providing an external audio solution in a simplified package that takes up less space than a full speaker system. One of Polk's latest entries in the soundbar department is the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Signa S3</a>.</p><p>Debuting at $250, the compelling soundbar package includes a wireless subwoofer and built-in Chromecast functionality. Its sleek and minimal design fits a multitude of home decors and its sound is aimed at delivering a step up from built-in TV speakers.</p><p>I've been testing the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Polk Signa S3</a> to see if this $250 soundbar offers satisfying performance while watching movies or listening to music. Is this a worthwhile upgrade to your TV's integrated speakers, or should you spend more for a higher end audio solution? Check out our full review below for all the details.</p><h2>Design</h2><p>At just over two inches tall, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Signa S3 soundbar</a> can definitely be called minimal. Its low profile, black and grey colors, and slightly curved front also make it attractive. There's nothing controversial about its design that will make it stand out, regardless of your home decor.</p><p>The Polk S3 soundbar unit and its matching subwoofer are perfectly subtle in their visual look. In fact, I would argue that the only downside to the system's styling is that it might look too bland or boring for some people. Personally, I like its dark, heathered front-facing look.&#160;</p><p>Beyond just the visual design, I'm also a fan of the materials used. Along the back is black plastic and the front is mesh fabric. Soundbars get dusty and sometimes using fabric on electronics can make them harder to clean. In this case, the Signa S3's fabric is taught and I find it easy to dust and wipe clean.</p><p>Another nice thing about its physical design are the buttons along the top. These are actual buttons, rather than touch-sensitive areas, and while it may be a cost-saving measure by Polk, I think they work well. In the back, the HDMI ARC and optical port are both placed at an angle so the soundbar can be pushed back flush against a wall or be mounted using the built-in hooks.</p><h2><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f493a8960bf1f0028079396?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Polk Soundbar\" height=\"1115\" width=\"1487\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Tyler Hayes/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></h2><h2>Specifications</h2><p><strong>Soundbar</strong></p><ul><li>Frequency response: 45 Hz - 20,000 Hz</li><li>Front array driver: two 1.25\" midrange and two 1\" tweeters</li><li>Remote type: Infrared (IR)</li><li>Dimensions: 2.15\" x 35.43\" x 3.22\"</li><li>Audio inputs: HDMI (ARC), Toslink Optical, analog 3.5mm mini-jack (AUX)</li><li>Wireless connectivity: Bluetooth, Chromecast</li></ul><p><strong>Subwoofer&#160;</strong></p><ul><li>Front array driver: 5.25\"</li><li>Dimensions: 13.4\" x 6.72\" x 12.2\"</li></ul><h2><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f493b117ffa48002894ce12?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Polk Soundbar\" height=\"1107\" width=\"1477\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Tyler Hayes/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></h2><h2>Features</h2><p>Despite the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Signa S3's</a> reasonable price, the soundbar still includes plenty of features that may help it win out over its competition. The biggest headlining feature is built-in Chromecast support. This allows you to cast (beam, transport, throw, or however else you want to describe it) audio from an app on your phone directly to the soundbar over Wi-Fi. This feature is easier to use than Bluetooth and is reminiscent of AirPlay functionality.</p><p>Chromecast technology is capable of sending audio and video, but in this case the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">S3</a> only utilizes the audio function. To use this feature you'll need to set it up inside the Google Home app on iOS or Android. Once that's done, Chromecast support will be available in the Home app or from an audio app with the cast symbol.</p><p>A good example of this feature is Spotify. Open the Spotify mobile app, tap on a song, and then in the lower left hand corner tap the speaker icon and select the Polk soundbar. Ultimately, streaming audio this way should provide better quality than Bluetooth, and using this method won't stop the music if another audio source comes up on your phone.</p><p>Of course, the soundbar also includes Bluetooth connectivity. This function works well and I haven't had any problems connecting to a smartphone or tablet after tapping the Bluetooth button on the soundbar.</p><h2>Performance</h2><p>No matter how great a soundbar may look or how many features it packs in for its price, the value of adding one to your TV really comes down to how it sounds. To that end, right up front, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Polk Signa S3</a> sounds pretty good.</p><p>The midrange soundbar doesn't sound as detailed and rich as the more expensive <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/sonos-arc-soundbar-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Sonos Arc</a>, but it does sound pretty amazing compared to the tiny speaker systems that you'll find stuffed into very thin TV sets.</p><p>The soundbar itself contains four drivers, each around one inch in size, which power the system's forward firing sound. As you might expect, if using the soundbar without the included subwoofer, the device's playback can sound a bit hollow. The sub, with its five-inch driver, provides a well-rounded low-end to lift the soundbar to an acceptable level.&#160;</p><p>Using the included remote, you're able to adjust the volume of the soundbar and the subwoofer independently. Overall, this option is a nice inclusion, but it does mean that it can be quite easy for things to get out of whack as you experiment with finding just the right balance between the two.</p><p>One of the main reasons you might want a soundbar is to improve the way dialogue sounds in movies and TV shows. If you're needing to raise the volume to a loud level to hear people speaking, you're a good candidate to add a soundbar to your home theater setup. To that point, a highlight of the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/Polk-Audio-Signa-S3-Ultra-Slim/dp/B089HY2K1R/\">S3</a> is its preset equalizer (EQ) settings designed to help with dialogue.&#160;</p><p>On the remote, there are six buttons dedicated to different sound settings. Three of the settings are for enhancing voice and boosting the frequency range for speaking. The others include modes for nighttime, movies, and music.</p><p>The voice settings are great for their intended purpose. Of course, in order to enhance dialogue there's always a trade-off in overall performance. When you use one of the voice settings, the soundbar removes bass in order to highlight the frequency of human speech. As a result, you can hear dialogue better, but the overall sound quality is thinner than usual. The music and movie settings get closer to a well-rounded mix, each highlighting elements important to those experiences.</p><p>Beyond the independent volume settings for the soundbar and subwoofer, and the six preset EQ modes, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Signa S3</a> doesn't offer much in the way of sound adjustments &#8212; what you hear is what you get. For the average household picking up this soundbar, the amount of control should be sufficient. If you crave more tweaking options, however, there's a good chance you're a candidate for a higher end speaker set.</p><p>The volume can get quite loud on the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Signa S3</a>. Depending on the room size and other video factors,&#160; I doubt most people will ever need to go above the 50% volume level. Raising the level is also where you begin to hear some of the inadequacies of the small drivers. As the volume raises the separation of high and low frequencies becomes clearer, and the upper frequencies begin to distort. At normal volume levels, however, this isn't really a notable issue.</p><h2><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f493af07ffa48002894ce0f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Polk Sound system\" height=\"1129\" width=\"1506\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Tyler Hayes/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></h2><h2>The bottom line</h2><p>Now that you can find decent <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-tv-under-500-dollars\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">50-inch TVs for just $400</a>, throwing a $250 soundbar into the mix can seem like a pricey addition. Still, I guarantee that the sound quality improvements you'll get with the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Signa S3</a> will dramatically improve your overall entertainment experience.&#160;</p><p>Now, there are other soundbars you should consider for pairing with high-end TVs, especially if you're looking for surround sound and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-dolby-atmos\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Dolby Atmos</a> support, but for pairing with TVs under $1,000, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B089HY2K1R/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_082820_polk-signa-s3-soundbar-review-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B089HY2K1R&linkId=3d3a624c4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc4bc9c71b653e92e8c5b763dc\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Polk Signa S3</a> is a great way to enhance the shows and movies you're watching.</p><h3>What are your alternatives?</h3><p>If $250 for a soundbar and subwoofer is just a little too much for your budget when picking up a sub $400 TV set, consider the<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-soundbar#the-best-budget-soundbar-2\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\"> Vizio SB362An-F6</a>. It incorporates 2.1 audio into a single unit, but most importantly, shouldn't cost you more than $100.</p><p>On the other side of the coin, if price isn't necessarily the issue, but you want something a little smarter, the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-soundbar#the-best-digital-assistant-soundbar-3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Sonos Beam</a> is a compact unit with voice control and built-in access to nearly every audio service imaginable. It features Wi-Fi connectivity, a Night Mode, speech enhancement, AirPlay 2, and Alexa or Google Assistant integration for around $400. On the downside, the Sonos Beam does not include Bluetooth support.&#160;</p><p>Of course, it should be noted that the Vizio and Sonos soundbars don't include separate subwoofers. If you're looking for an alternative with a subwoofer, the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-soundbar#the-best-soundbar-overall-1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Yamaha YAS-209</a> soundbar incorporates a dedicated subwoofer and features Alexa voice control for around $350. This model is Insider Reviews' current pick for the best soundbar overall, but it's $100 more than the Signa S3 and it doesn't feature Chromecast support.</p><p>For more soundbar recommendations, be sure to read our full guide to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-soundbar\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">the best soundbars</a>.</p><p><strong>Pros</strong>: Good sound for price, Chromecast and Bluetooth, sleek and minimal design</p><p><strong>Cons</strong>: EQ settings are limited, controlling soundbar and subwoofer volumes independently can be tricky</p><div 2020 15:49:16 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f493ed17ffa48002894ce36?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"b074db38efe6ebe38e186d53722ccc1e","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn43@2020_6/2020/08/31/17-21-55-824_32479feb75f3bea3.webp","destWidth":1413,"destHeight":1059,"sourceBytes":78588,"destBytes":78588,"author":"insider@insider.com (Tyler Hayes)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f493a407ffa48002894ce08?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn28@2020_3/2020/08/31/17-22-08-516_e13dd8b19a2b834f.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f493a8960bf1f0028079396?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn35@2020_6/2020/08/31/17-22-19-147_c27b92c15f602d82.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f493b117ffa48002894ce12?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn36@2020_4/2020/08/31/17-22-17-471_e8a8262304092295.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f493af07ffa48002894ce0f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn36@2020_5/2020/08/31/17-22-15-840_65be127bf5f2b731.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn51@2020_3/2020/08/31/17-22-14-421_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=mEM271xH-AQ:ci8U8DTSZ9c:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn100@2020_6/2020/08/31/17-22-13-566_0170ae59b2b68225.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=mEM271xH-AQ:ci8U8DTSZ9c:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn79@2020_1/2020/08/31/17-22-14-851_c53dddeb67565547.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn76@2020_1/2020/08/31/17-22-07-798_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=mEM271xH-AQ:ci8U8DTSZ9c:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn43@2020_3/2020/08/31/17-22-08-703_bc7cd5f5871414d7.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/mEM271xH-AQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn87@2020_6/2020/08/31/17-21-59-029_5d52474017c5bda4.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598894512925},{"createdTime":"2020-09-01 01:21:52","updatedTime":"2020-09-01 01:21:52","title":"What is USB-C? The latest and most powerful type of USB cable, explained","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-usb-c","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d2cf260bf1f00280797f2?format=jpeg\" alt=\"USB C chargers\" height=\"1500\" width=\"3000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>USB-C cables are oval-shaped, and almost impossible to plug in incorrectly.\n<p class=\"copyright\">NurPhoto/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><strong>A USB-C cable is a new type of USB connector that's easier to use, and is more powerful than older USB types.</strong></li><li><strong>USB-C cables can be used to quickly charge many popular devices, including the MacBook Pro and Nintendo Switch, and transfer data faster than any other USB type.</strong></li><li><strong>As time goes on, more and more devices will likely use USB-C cables, so it's good to have one around.</strong></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-module=\"summary_bullets\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"0\">Visit Business Insider's Tech Reference library for more stories</a>.</strong></li></ul><p><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/usb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">USB</a> stands for \"Universal Serial Bus.\" It was named this because engineers felt it would replace other connectors on the market to become the one universal connector.</p><p>Unfortunately, things didn't work out so neatly. Over the years, a half-dozen variations of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/usb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">USB</a> have emerged, including mini-USB and micro-USB.</p><p>And the main <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/usb\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">USB</a> connector style, called USB-A, is infamously flawed. Almost-but-not-quite symmetric, it's infuriatingly difficult to insert properly on the first try.&#160;</p><p>Now, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/usb-c\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">USB-C</a> is the latest version of the USB standard. But unlike the rest, USB-C might be good enough to stick around.</p><p>Here's what you should know about <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/category/usb-c\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">USB-C</a>, the best take on the technology in years.</p><h2><strong>USB-C, explained</strong></h2><p>The USB-C connector is immediately recognizable, because unlike the older USB-A, it has an oval shape &#8212; a rectangle with its corners smoothed into a curve. It's completely symmetrical, so it's impossible to insert incorrectly.</p><p>In addition, USB-C is narrow enough that it can fit on phones with no problem. This means that it can be a standard connector for both computers and phones, as well as other devices like game consoles.</p><p>Some popular devices that use USB-C cables are the Nintendo Switch, MacBook Pro, and Samsung Galaxy line of phones.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f4d2b0860bf1f00280797ea?format=jpeg\" alt=\"usb c\" height=\"605\" width=\"1211\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>USB-C is a smarter connector because it&#39;s perfectly symmetrical — you can insert it blind-folded.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Santeri Viinamäki</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><h2><strong>USB-C connectors are the fastest around &#8212; with the right setup</strong></h2><p>USB-C connectors can be used to transfer data, power, and even video and audio.&#160;</p><p>However, how fast it works depends on what you're connecting it to.</p><p>Different devices have different types of USB ports. These are generally split into three types: USB 3.1, USB 3.2, and Thunderbolt 3 (the latter mainly found on Apple computers). You can see what type you have by checking your device's manual, or contacting the manufacturer.</p><p>By default, a USB-C cable plugged into a USB 3.1 port can transfer 10 gigabytes of data per second. Plugging into a 3.2 port will get you 20 gigabytes per second. And Thunderbolt 3 ports allow USB-C cables to carry a substantial 40 gigabytes per second.</p><p>This is much faster than any other sort of USB connector.</p><p>USB-C cables are also used to transfer power &#8212; they're commonly used to charge portable devices, smartphones, laptops, and even security cameras.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/58261901691e8821008b6579?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Macbook Pro charging iPhone usb c\" height=\"1500\" width=\"2250\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>USB-C cables can be used for transferring both data and power.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Hollis Johnson/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>A standard USB-C connector can provide 2.5 watts of power, which is the same as most USB-A connectors. But many devices use something called a Power Delivery (PD) protocol, which will let a USB-C cable deliver up to 100 watts.</p><p>PD cables can charge laptops and other high-wattage devices, something impossible for the older USB standards.</p><p>In short: USB-C cables far outpace other types of USB cables. As time goes on, more and more devices will start using USB-C.</p><h2 id=\"related-coverage-from-tech-reference:\">Related coverage from&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-reference\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"4c86c1c3a45644bf07d168dc4c802e5e\">Tech Reference</a>:</h2><ul><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/does-usb-c-charge-faster\" data-analytics-position=\"1\" data-analytics-module=\"\">Does USB-C charge faster than USB? Here's what you need to know about USB charging and data transfer speeds</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/is-thunderbolt-the-same-as-usb-c\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"31c384b8e8ce61fa16e6db17b65edfde\">'Is Thunderbolt the same as USB-C?': What you need to know about Thunderbolt 3's high-speed connectivity, in relation to USB-C cables</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-clean-usb-c-port\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"8d8712e0b778fe5e6bcc8b31110dd6e4\">How to clean the USB-C port on your phone or laptop without damaging the device</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-boot-from-usb-windows-10\" data-analytics-post-depth=\"100\" data-uri=\"6414f2fe634044c250bd9932b0ff6a91\">How to boot your Windows 10 computer from a USB drive</a></h3></li><li><h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-to-play-music-on-ps4\" data-analytics-position=\"4\" data-analytics-module=\"\">How to play music on a PS4 using Spotify or a USB drive</a></h3></li></ul><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a <li><strong>A KitchenAid stand mixer serves as an indispensable tool for many baking and cooking needs.&nbsp;</strong></li>\n <li><strong>If you swap out the generic mixing attachment with specialized ones, you can even use your KitchenAid to knead dough, make pasta, and more.</strong></li>\n <li><strong>The <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biipgf_090117_best-kitchenaid-mixers/https://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/stand-mixers/tilt-head-stand-mixers/p.artisan-series-5-quart-tilt-head-stand-mixer.ksm150pser.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored\">KitchenAid Artisan Series 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer</a> tops our list because it does all of these things and more.</strong></li>\n</ul>\n<p>KitchenAid mixers make home baking a cinch. Aside from the satisfaction of a job well done, making your own baked goods from scratch tastes better, is better for you, and generally costs less than buying products from the store.&nbsp;</p>\n<p>Even if baking isn't your thing, there are plenty of other uses for these mixers. If you've ever watched <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-online-cooking-classes-masterclass\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">a baking or cooking show</a>, you have likely noticed a KitchenAid mixer. There are a handful of different styles and sizes, we break down what the popular ones are over here.&nbsp;</p>\n<h2>Here are the best KitchenAid stand mixers:</h2>\n<ul class=\"summary-list\">\n <li><strong>Best overall: <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biipgf_090117_best-kitchenaid-mixers/https://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/stand-mixers/tilt-head-stand-mixers/p.artisan-series-5-quart-tilt-head-stand-mixer.ksm150pser.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored\">KitchenAid Artisan Series 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer</a> </strong></li>\n <li><strong>Best on a budget: <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biipgf_090117_best-kitchenaid-mixers/https://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/stand-mixers/tilt-head-stand-mixers/p.classic-series-4.5-quart-tilt-head-stand-mixer.k45ssob.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">KitchenAid 4.5-Quart Classic Series Stand Mixer</a></strong></li>\n <li><strong>Best for bread:&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004LS8HNO/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipgf_090617_best-stand-mixers-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B004LS8HNO&amp;linkId=52929af098ce73e83f4a5c1afcd3c45e98ce73e83f4a5c1afcd3c45e\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored\">KitchenAid Professional 5 Plus Series Stand Mixer</a></strong></li>\n <li><strong>Check out our full guide to the <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-kitchenaid-attachment\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">best KitchenAid attachments</a></strong></li>\n <li><strong>Check out other <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-stand-mixer\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">best stand mixers</a> we recommend</strong></li>\n</ul>\n<p><em>Prices and links are current as of 8/31/20. We removed <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/KitchenAid 5-Qt. Artisan Design Series with Glass Bowl\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">our pick for a splurge option</a> as we've determined that the glass bowl isn't as versatile or durable as the stainless steel option. We've also removed the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0087XKXRC/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipgf_090117_best-kitchenaid-mixers-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B0087XKXRC&amp;linkId=6dd2fb0344189f10331f8cb7bf4c98c844189f10331f8cb7bf4c98c8\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored\">KitchenAid 6 Qt. Professional 600 Series</a> as it's better suited for making large mixes on a daily basis. Both options are not very useful for average or beginner home cooks and bakers.&nbsp;</em></p> \n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n  The best overall \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/59a7149f6eac40d11c8b685d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"KitchenAid\" height=\"750\" width=\"1000\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">KitchenAid</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <h3>From bread dough to honey, the <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biipgf_090117_best-kitchenaid-mixers/https://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/stand-mixers/tilt-head-stand-mixers/p.artisan-series-5-quart-tilt-head-stand-mixer.ksm150pser.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored\">KitchenAid Artisan Series 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer</a>&nbsp;is powerful enough to handle just about anything you throw at it.</h3>\n <p>The <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biipgf_090117_best-kitchenaid-mixers/https://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/stand-mixers/tilt-head-stand-mixers/p.artisan-series-5-quart-tilt-head-stand-mixer.ksm150pser.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored\">KitchenAid Artisan Series 5 Quart Tilt-Head Stand Mixer</a> is designed for the serious home baker or cook. It comes with a 5-quart stainless steel bowl that can mix dough for up to four loaves of bread or nine dozen cookies in one batch. This stand mixer includes a six-wire whisk attachment, coated flat beater, one-piece pouring shield, and coated dough hook, and you can also choose from 10 other attachments to turn your mixer into a&nbsp; food grinder, pasta maker, and more.</p>\n <p>There are more than 20 colors available, so there's definitely an option that matches the décor of your kitchen. Red is by far the most popular based on our empirical observations.</p>\n <p>This is a sturdy workhorse of a mixer. For every rotation around the bowl, the dough hook, wire whip, or beater has 59 touchpoints for more thorough mixing — perfect for ensuring even bakes. The motor is also strong enough to knead bread dough for several minutes. There is no overload protection, however, so be sure to knead on low speeds and give your mixer a break in between tests so as not to overwhelm the motor.&nbsp;</p>\n <p>The tilt-head is what sets it apart from other KitchenAid stand mixers. It's easy to flip up the head to add ingredients more evenly and lock in place to mix and blend, though you should be careful when doing either to avoid splashing yourself with a wet mixture or a poof of flour. Because the head will be out of the way, it's also more convenient to load and unload the mixing bowl underneath the attachment heads.&nbsp;</p>\n <p>However, the biggest issue is that the mixing bowl sometimes can initially leave a gray residue on the food you are preparing due to polishing material. KitchenAid recommends scrubbing your mixer bowl with baking soda or lemon and salt to remove any residue from the bowl before your first use.</p>\n <p><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.kitchenaid.com/custom.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow sponsored\">KitchenAid</a> also has a tool that lets you customize the stand color, mixing bowl, and more for this particular model. If you're looking to give a personalized kitchen gift or just upgrade your own stand mixer, this tool is a great place to start.&nbsp; Read more about <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/kitchenaid-stand-mixer-customization-tool\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">KitchenAid's stand mixer customization tool here.</a></p>\n <p><strong>Pros: </strong>Powerful 325-watt motor, comes with a pouring shield, dozens of colors to choose from, ability to customize</p>\n <p><strong>Cons: </strong>No overload protection</p> The best on a budget \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/59a7141f79bbfd2d0d8b50f9?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Best_KitchenAid_Mixers_ _K45SS_ _Amazon\" height=\"938\" width=\"1251\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">KitchenAid</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <h3>The <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biipgf_090117_best-kitchenaid-mixers/https://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/stand-mixers/tilt-head-stand-mixers/p.classic-series-4.5-quart-tilt-head-stand-mixer.k45ssob.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">KitchenAid K45SS 4.5-Quart Classic Series Stand Mixer</a> is the ideal mixer for beginner bakers since it is affordable and can handle most mixing tasks.</h3>\n <p>The <a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biipgf_090117_best-kitchenaid-mixers/https://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/stand-mixers/tilt-head-stand-mixers/p.classic-series-4.5-quart-tilt-head-stand-mixer.k45ssob.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">K45SS</a> is the least expensive KitchenAid so it's going to be a solid introductory model if you're looking to enter the world of the stand mixers. It comes with a 4.5-quart bowl, a coated dough hook, 10-speed settings powered by a 250-watt motor, a wire whip, and a coated flat beater. It works with more than a dozen optional attachments that can be used to make pasta, grind meat, and much more.</p>\n <p>The mixer has a relatively small motor so it's very quiet. You can control the speed using a shifting knob on the side of the unit. The K45SS does not have a slow-start mixing option, so if you're mixing dry ingredients such as flour, it could send ingredients flying. You can combat this with a <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/stand-mixers/accessories/p.1-piece-pouring-shield.kn1ps.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">pouring shield</a> or a strategically placed kitchen towel.</p>\n <p>Because the motor is smaller than other KitchenAids, it won't be able to handle tougher tasks like long kneading sessions or particularly thick mixtures without strain. Short bursts on low speed should be fine, but you'll have to be careful not to overload the motor.</p>\n <p>This model is also a bit smaller in stature, so it won't take up as much room on your counter as some of the larger models. If you have the spare cabinet space, you might even be able to store it away when not in use, but it's a pretty heavy machine to continually take out and put away.</p>\n <p>The included bowl does not have a handle. It may not be an issue for the smaller bowl size but you can pick up a <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/stand-mixers/attachments/p.4.5-qt-4.28-l-brushed-stainless-steel-bowl.k45sbwh.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">replacement bowl with a handle</a>&nbsp;if that bothers you.</p>\n <p><strong>Pros: </strong>Affordable, 10 different speed settings, tilt-up mixer head</p>\n <p><strong>Cons: </strong>Usable but not very powerful motor, no slow-start mixing option, mixing bowl doesn't have a handle</p> The best for bread \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/59a7150e6eac401c008b6d41?format=jpeg\" alt=\"kitchen aid pro\" height=\"1492\" width=\"1989\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">KitchenAid</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <h3>With a 450-watt motor, the <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004LS8HNO/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipgf_090617_best-stand-mixers-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B004LS8HNO&amp;linkId=52929af098ce73e83f4a5c1afcd3c45e\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored\">KitchenAid Professional 5 Plus Series Stand Mixer</a> is one of KitchenAid's most powerful mixers. The slow-start function makes it particularly well-suited for making bread.</h3>\n <p>For the past 15 years, I have owned and regularly used the forebear of the Professional 5 Plus: the Professional 5. The Plus improves upon my model with a stronger motor (450 watts verses 350 watts), overload protection, and slow start. It packs a lot of power while taking up relatively little counter space, and at 16.5 inches tall, it fits under most cabinets.</p>\n <p>I bake two loaves of bread per week with my mixer and it has never had a problem kneading the dough. My model has also done a fabulous job mixing ingredients and batter for cookies, cake, pie, and everything else we ask of it, so it's safe to assume the Plus can do an even better job.&nbsp;</p>\n <p>The <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004LS8HNO/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipgf_090617_best-stand-mixers-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B004LS8HNO&amp;linkId=52929af098ce73e83f4a5c1afcd3c45e\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored\">KitchenAid Professional 5 Plus</a> has a 10-speed motor with a slow-start function and overload protection. It comes with a 5-quart stainless steel mixing bowl featuring an ergonomic handle. Also, the hinged hub cover flips up to make it easier to install attachments, including the spiral dough hook, wire whip, and flat beater that it comes with. The bowl is lifted to the mixer using a simple lever that securely stays in place.</p>\n <p>The overload reset, which automatically shuts off your mixer should it begin to overheat, sets this model apart from other KitchenAid products. A slow start-up keeps your ingredients from flying everywhere too. The powerful motor, however, does make more noise than the other picks on our list.&nbsp;</p>\n <p>Due to a unique design in which the beater spins clockwise as the shaft and bowl spin counter-clockwise, there are 67 touchpoints for even mixing.&nbsp;</p>\n <p><strong>Pros: </strong>Advanced features, ergonomic design, 67-point mixing, powerful motor</p>\n <p><strong>Cons: </strong>Heavy, loud</p> What else we considered \n <figure> \n  <img src=\"https://i.insider.com/59a716b66eac401c008b6d69?format=jpeg\" alt=\"kitchenaid artisan\" height=\"1489\" width=\"1985\" charset=\"\"> \n   <figcaption> \n    <p class=\"copyright\">KitchenAid</p> \n   </figcaption> </img>\n </figure> \n <ul>\n  <li><a href=\"http://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/sid/biipgf_090117_best-kitchenaid-mixers/https://www.kitchenaid.com/countertop-appliances/stand-mixers/tilt-head-stand-mixers/p.artisan-design-series-5-quart-tilt-head-stand-mixer-with-glass-bowl.ksm155gbca.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow\">KitchenAid Artisan Design Series with Glass Bowl</a>: This was previously our splurge pick, but the glass bowl is less durable than the usual stainless steel bowl. It's an additional $40 on an already investment-worth kitchen tool, but one that wouldn't last a few drops if your hands are wet.&nbsp;&nbsp;</li>\n  <li><p><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00QRI7746/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;tag=biipgf_090117_best-kitchenaid-mixers-20&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;creativeASIN=B00QRI7746&amp;linkId=3d722979330f8fe0edd34f66af228db2\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">KitchenAid Professional 600 Series Bowl-Lift Stand Mixer</a>: With a six-quart capacity and powerful 575-watt motor that can make 13 dozen cookies or eight loaves of bread in one batch, this stand mixer is better suited for someone who bakes a lot daily, which isn't most amateur home bakers. At nearly 30 pounds, this isn't a machine you're going to be picking up and moving around often, but if that sounds like you, be sure that you have the counter space.&nbsp;</p></li>\n </ul>\n <p>&nbsp;</p> What to look for in a KitchenAid stand mixer \n <p>KitchenAid stand mixers are the standard in the industry for their versatility — they can mix, blend, knead, and more for many baking and cooking needs.&nbsp; Here are some things to consider when you're ready to ramp up your culinary experience.&nbsp;</p>\n <h3>Tilt-head versus bowl-lift</h3>\n <p>KitchenAid mixers come with either a tilt-head or a lever that lifts your bowl up to the mixing attachment. They're both great but the lift models tend to be taller and wider, therefore they require more counter space. They are generally more sturdy than the tilt-head units, which can bounce when handling larger batches of dough, not it's not a major issue.</p>\n <h3>Accessories and attachments</h3>\n <p>Most KitchenAids already come with a handful of useful attachments but there's an <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-kitchenaid-attachment\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">array of optional attachments and accessories</a> available. Many attachments work across all models. Here are a few of the most popular accessories:</p>\n <ul>\n  <li><strong><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bedbathandbeyond.com%2Fstore%2Fproduct%2Fkitchenaid-reg-ice-cream-maker-bowl-attachment%2F1013369224\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored\">Ice Cream Maker</a>:&nbsp;</strong>In 20 to 30 minutes, this attachment will make up to two quarts of gelato, sorbet, or ice cream.</li>\n  <li><strong><a href=\"https://amzn.to/2euTBOQ\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored\">Pasta Roller and Cutter</a>:</strong>&nbsp;Stainless steel cutters and rollers produce six-inch sheets of pasta with eight thickness settings and can be cut for fettuccine, spaghetti, and more.</li>\n  <li><strong><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bedbathandbeyond.com%2Fstore%2Fproduct%2Fkitchenaid-reg-metal-food-grinder-attachment%2F5215258\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Food Grinder</a>:</strong>&nbsp;Use this to grind dried bread, meat, vegetables, cheeses, firm fruit, and use it with the stuffer set to make sausage.</li>\n  <li><strong><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bedbathandbeyond.com%2Fstore%2Fproduct%2Fkitchenaid-reg-food-processor-stand-mixer-attachment%2F1042903499\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener noreferrer nofollow sponsored\">Food Processor</a>:</strong>&nbsp;This attachment will shred, dice, julienne, and slice any vegetables, cheeses, and fruits.</li>\n
